channel.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail data type contains the additional email for use in ticket update notifications. Local email Email assigned to user for use in ticket update notifications. Type: string userId An internal identifier for the portal user who this additional email belongs to. Type: integer Relational user The portal user that owns this additional email address.
